item.description: Frontmatter # Assuming you have already setuped the Quartz we can move forward now So creating notes each time with [[#This is frontmatter|frontmatter]] is annoying so we are going to make sure Template Plugin is active , it’s a core plugin so you do not have to install it. You can set Shortcut to Ctrl+T or Alt+T for easier access This is frontmatter # --- title: "Example Title" tags: - example-tag --- Rest of your content here.
